website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for seniors and smaller breeds, these mini-sized treats are squishy and full of flavor that little dogs can’t resist.
pros: Extra soft for small and senior dogs
Oven-baked, and made with all-natural ingredients like peanut butter, bacon, oatmeal, and spearmint extract
cons: Avoid if your dog has issues digesting wheat

customer_reviews.title: Yorkies Love Them.  Designer Dog H
customer_reviews.text: Both of my mini Yorkies love all of the flavors in this brand. I have purchased 4 different flavors. I have to confess that the Chicken and Apple were as hard as cured concrete. They came hard unlike the others that are soft and cheswy. Depite the hardness of one flavor I love the fact that the ingredients are minimal and wholesome.
customer_reviews.author: Gaylynn

customer_reviews.title: Soft Snacks For Little Dogs
customer_reviews.text: I love the Old Mother Hubbard Soft & Tasty Snacks for my dog. She is a toy dog and requires only little snacks and cannot chew on hard things, so these are perfect for her to chew and she loves the taste of them. I like Old Mother Hubbard the brand as they use good ingredients and I appreciate that.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C

customer_reviews.title: They love em
customer_reviews.text: My two dogs love these. I always used to get the crunchy ones and still do because they’ve always like those since they were puppies, but then I found these and wanted to try them out as well. I don’t think they smell very peanut buttery personally, but my nose isn’t as refined as a dogs nose 😆
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Buy your dog some Old Mothers Hubbard!
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves these treats. There also good for training. As soon as I go to her treat jar she gets so excited. She takes the treat straight to her bed and it seem likes she inhales it. I’ve been purchasing this brand for over a year and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Dante

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: my dog absolutely loves these i really really hope you bring them back please. he loves them thank you
customer_reviews.author: April P.

customer_reviews.title: Great, healthy product!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a all over 5 star review even though my pup isn't interested in them. I know from prior experience that this is a great quality treat. Healthy ingredients. Most doggies would love them! Thank you, Janet.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Verisotosky

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and delicious
customer_reviews.text: All three of my dogs love these treats! Perfect size for dachshunds!
customer_reviews.author: Joelle Denham

customer_reviews.title: Strong molasses smell
customer_reviews.text: When opening the bag, these dog treats smelled very strongly of something like molasses. Our Boston Terrier who eats almost everything refused to eat them.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy's Girl

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Smells like chemicals and my dog wants nothing to do with it
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Barquest

customer_reviews.title: Puppy doesn’t like them
customer_reviews.text: Treats arrived as described and only giving 2 stars because my puppy wouldn’t eat them and he is not a picky eater and loved other peanut butter and bacon treats.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug92479

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love these!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs could eat a whole bag of these if I let them! They absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Sneathern

customer_reviews.title: Thank you...
customer_reviews.text: I have the pickiest dog. I have tried every dog treat out there (no lie), finally I have found something she will not turn her nose up and walk away from!!
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE HICKS

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Treats
customer_reviews.text: We love this brand and these new softer treats are awesome! Both of our dogs go crazy for them (and they smell like a molasses cookie)
customer_reviews.author: Mason the Tator Tot

customer_reviews.title: All natural fresh
customer_reviews.text: Great product for senior Dogs or dogs dental issues all natural ingredients very fresh would recommend
customer_reviews.author: JAJL

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these. His favorite treat.
customer_reviews.text: My dachshund goes crazy for these! Excellent company. Will be back for more.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Biscuits
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 dogs just love them! They will go outside frequently just to get them when they come back inside after 2 minutes of being outside.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, My Pup Loves!
customer_reviews.text: Looking to upgrade from Milkbones to more wholesome ingredients, we found this brand and haven't looked back!
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: NOT FRESH
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality - not fresh at all and I bought two bags and both were shocking quality
customer_reviews.author: Darren Joubert

customer_reviews.title: 🐕 Approved!
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes them and so I have no complaints. These are used as a reward for were he 💩 in the right spot.
customer_reviews.author: Kandid

product_meta.title: Old Mother Hubbard Soft & Tasty Peanut Butter & Bacon Biscuits Baked Dog Treats, Mini, 8 Ounce Bag
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Peanut Butter| Size:8ozOur soft & Tasty treats are crafted to be a chewy delight your dog will love! These oven-baked snacks are crafted with all-natural ingredients, delicious natural flavors, and a soft texture perfect for puppies, seniors, or any dog that prefers a softer treat.
feature_bullets: MINI SOFT TREATS: These mini soft and tasty dog biscuits make a great training treat and a great addition to your dog's diet; they feature all natural ingredients and assorted natural flavors including peanut butter, bacon and oatmeal
ALL NATURAL: Our yummy biscuit recipes include wholesome natural ingredients such as real peanut butter, fruits and vegetables; each biscuit is slowly oven baked to preserve the natural flavors

Made in the USA using only the finest globally sourced ingredients; we craft delicious recipes with simple, natural ingredients thoughtfully chosen for their nutritional benefits; no artificial preservatives or meat byproducts
THE NATURAL CHOICE: From puppy to senior, small dog to large breed, crunchy to chewy, grained to grain free, treating to training, we've got an all natural recipe for every dog's needs and taste

GIVE 'EM SOME SNACK LOVE: We've used the same simple methods to bake our snacks since 1926; each home style recipe is crafted from wholesome ingredients so you can feel good about giving your dog a reward that's healthy and heartfelt

specifications.Series: Old Mother Hubbard Soft & Tasty Peanut Butter & Bacon Biscuits Baked Dog Treats, Mini, 8 Ounce Bag
specifications.Manufacturer: Mountain Country Foods: Spanish Fork, UT
